snippet: Villanova announced that the recently hired assistant Doug Martin resigned because of inaccuracies on his résumé.
abstract: Villanova announces that the recently hired assistant basketball coach Doug Martin resigned because of inaccuracies on his resume.
lead_paragraph: Villanova announced that the recently hired assistant Doug Martin resigned because of inaccuracies on his résumé.

headline.seo: Villanova’s Assistant Basketball Coach Doug Martin Resigns
headline.main: Villanova’s Assistant Basketball Coach Steps Down
